video.cantLoad: Your browser does not support the video tag.

right.text: Press the right arrow to accelerate the character in the direction of automatic movement.

left.text: Press the left arrow to accelerate the character in the direction opposite to the automatic movement.

jump.text: Hold down the up arrow or space bar to jump. The longer the key is pressed, the larger the jump. A new jump cannot be started while a jump is in progress.

contact.text: Did you find any bugs or have an idea how to improve the game? We will be glad to hear from you.

settings.warning: Using values other than the default ones may result in a negative gaming experience. Adjust game settings thoughtfully.

healRate.label: Heal rate
healRate.text: The number of seconds after which a player's life will be restored.

baseTimeInSeconds.label: Base time
baseTimeInSeconds.text: The number of seconds the player will be credited at the start of the game.

maxPlayerLifes.label: Lifes
maxPlayerLifes.text: The maximum number of lifes a player can have.

immortalityDuration.label: Duration in ms
immortalityDuration.text: The time in milliseconds that immortality lasts.

addTimeEveryNumberOfCoins.label: Count
addTimeEveryNumberOfCoins.text: The number of coins that need to be collected to increase the timer.

timeAdditionInSeconds.label: Count
timeAdditionInSeconds.text: The number of seconds added after collecting the required number of coins.
